article:
Mrs Black was waiting  _  an important  telephone call , but she had  _  bread in the house, so she left the baby at home and said to her five-year-old son. "I'm going to the shop, Jimmy, and I'll  be back  in a few minutes."
When she was  _ , the telephone rang, and Jimmy answered. "Hello," said a man, "Is your mother there?" "No," Jimmy answered. "Well, when she comes back, tell her that Mr Baker telephoned." "What?" "Mr Baker. Write it  _ ." "I can't write." "Little boy, is there anybody else  _  you? Any brothers or sisters?" "My brother Billy is here." "Good! I want to talk to him, please." "All right," Jimmy took the  _  to the baby's bed and gave it to Billy.
When their mother came back, she asked, "Did  anyone  telephone?" "Yes," said Jimmy, "A man only wants to talk to  _ ."
